title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points total

1 point - Latin/English x 2. Student names two out of three:

  1. gloria (tantarum rerum): glory (of such great events) - the fact that his mission itself is glorious

  2. (tua) laude: (for your own) praise/honor/glory - personal honor/glory

  3. moliris laborem: undertaking a task.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

2 points total

1 point - Latin/English x 2. Student names two out of three:

  1. gloria (tantarum rerum): glory (of such great events) - the fact that his mission itself is glorious

  2. (tua) laude: (for your own) praise/honor/glory - personal honor/glory

  3. moliris laborem: undertaking a task.

Student response earns one of the available points.

2 points total

1 point - Latin/English x 2. Student names two out of three:

  1. gloria (tantarum rerum): glory (of such great events) - the fact that his mission itself is glorious

  2. (tua) laude: (for your own) praise/honor/glory - personal honor/glory

  3. moliris laborem: undertaking a task.

Student response earns two of the available points.
